website_summaries.verdict: A great premium barcode scanner with an enhanced receiver and wireless connectivity.
pros: Comes with a large recharging cradel with a built-in antenna receiver for better connectivity
Receiver handles multiple signals at the same time for multi-person use
cons: Setup can be a bit difficult the first time of use before everything works

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with our first scanner but the company was extremely helpful and quickly sent a replacement scanner. The new one is working great. It has a long range, reads codes easily and is comfortable and charges effortlessly on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Allen F. Difrischia

customer_reviews.title: Prevented boot-up
customer_reviews.text: I received this scanner and had high hopes that it would help me get more than a few feet from my PC in the warehouse. Plug and play was not an issue and had no trouble with the transmitting distance to the base. I felt like you had to be pretty close to read our legacy barcodes that our wired scanners didn't have issues with. Average 3-4 inches to read. I was still happy with the fact I wasn't tethered to the PC. Restarted the PC one day and the thing would not boot-up until I unplugged the scanner. Tried a different PC, same issue. Returned for refund!
customer_reviews.author: Oki-Sil-80

customer_reviews.title: It scans easily right into an excel sheet or Google Docs sheet
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works very well. It scans easily right into an excel sheet or Google Docs sheet. I am a computer teacher at a school and this scanner has helped me to quickly inventory all of the technology equipment in my school. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Strong

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The range is great and it worked great for our needs. The programming options is fantastic as well. You can really do a lot with the programming if you need to (we have ours going into power save after 2 minutes and we have the scanner add digits automatically). We did have the unit fail after a few months, it was odd. BUT the company sent us out a new one right away, so that was great. Anything can fail with technology so we don't need to knock off any ratings for that. It's a great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE WITH MAC
customer_reviews.text: WARNING MAC OWNERS... this scanner is NOT compatible with Macs. I wasted 3 hours of my life trying to make is sync with my computer. Then after emailing the company, I get a response 14 hours later telling me that it’s not compatible with Mac. EVEN though it says it is on Amazon. Extremely frustrating bc I specifically made sure that the scanner I was going to buy would work with my computer. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: the quality is excellent, and the Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: This tool was quite the surprise at how well it works, being new to Barcode Scanning I didn't have any experience . The scanner works perfectly ,the quality is excellent, and the Price is Right ! I have ordered two more for use at workstations. A real plus for Amazon users, you can scan a UPC Label right into Amazon Search, Like magic it pops up ! if you use the One Click Buy you can place the order fast ! Scan It ,Click It Done ! 5 Stars for this Scanner
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Deese

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice scanner with some great range. My warehouse guy loved it. The only issue he had was the sleep time setting would not stick so it kept defaulting to the original which is very short. Besides that issue it scans very well and is pretty darn durable. It has been dropped multiple times without any damage other than cosmetic.
customer_reviews.author: Hungoverfurball

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and program A+
customer_reviews.text: A great scanner that you simply plug in a start scanning. Easy to program with included booklet. Long battery life to last the entire work day. Long range connection to scan across our office without any issues. Scans to any program or window. We liked it so much we bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: City-Souvenirs

customer_reviews.title: Scanner works great!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works great straight of the box. No set up was required. The only thing that was annoying was a flashing blue light when the scanner is in the cradle. But don't be discouraged about that, a piece of black electrical tape took care of this issue - so much you can't even see it. We have tried other scanners, and this out performs them all! Buy without doubt!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Really complicate to set up
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to configure, not easy that all. Need to scan a bunch of bar codes to set it up and make it read correctly and once you put it back to the base you need to start all over again ... crazy... I don't recommend it at least you are a very patient person.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Santana

customer_reviews.title: Scanner died
customer_reviews.text: The scanner said to have a great battery life. It did not was dead in the first day had to do all the upc's manually. Emailed for a scanner manual and haven't hear anything at all
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Works great, cheap, what else do you need
customer_reviews.text: Works great, plugged in, drivers were downloaded/installed automatically and it just works. Nothing too fancy or crazy, it works great for a low-priced, wireless barcode reader.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin C.

customer_reviews.title: Fully customizable and works perfect for my small Business.
customer_reviews.text: First read the manual it has a ton of great information and things you can customize. Oh and the manual is written in English instead of a translate program. and the charging cradle is a nice touch . the only thing i want is a retractable cord so I could get the perfect cord length but hey cable management is A billion+ dollar industry.
customer_reviews.author: CFiowa

customer_reviews.title: Good Value.
customer_reviews.text: Great beam (tall and bright). Much much quick scans versus cheaper corded unit I bought (TaoTronics). Battery life disappointing (just need to recharge nightly). Very quick startup from sleep. Rubber cover at bottom of gun falls off. Survived a 3 foot drop to concrete no problem. Good value vs Symbol brand. Worked out of the box without any code shooting programming.
customer_reviews.author: Frisco Dad

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy... not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading the bad reviews, I decided to give it a try as I wouldn't be using it as much as others. Received it after noon and set it up, it worked good for the price. Came back the next morning and the "laser head out of condition." Laser wouldn't show to scan and wouldn't read. The device just sat on the cradle overnight. Wasn't dropped or mishandled. So, spend the money and get a respectable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Seales

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Terrible scanner. It's wireless so you'd think you could have some distance between you and your computer. But if you are more than 2 feet away, it won't scan. I wish I had returned this but it's too late now.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Garton

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, perfect for cataloging!
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner. Received quickly and makes cataloging my enormous media and book collection so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: the blue light keeps blinking other than that its fine, tried 2 other before going with this one would have gave it 5 stars if the light on the receiver would to blinking like the cops are at my house
customer_reviews.author: Unluckygamer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I love these readers. They work great. I keep on buying more. They're a great value. I don't always write reviews. I had to this time.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great range and Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Literally a plug and play device. No need for any stressful set up in order to get this device to work with POS etc. haven't tested the full range of the device but I can back up the fact that it can work up to 50 feet away and a floor in between.
customer_reviews.author: Arivu Anukanth

customer_reviews.title: Very quick resolution to a bad scanner
customer_reviews.text: The scanner I was sent seemed to be not programmed correctly as the function to remove the prefix was not working, after emailing Namadoo they reached out right away and tried to help me resolve it. We found that the scanner was broken and need to be replaced, they sent one right away and corrected the issue. Overall a good experience
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Better scanners out there....
customer_reviews.text: Have to scan a barcode twice in order for it to read. Tried to play with different settings, no dice. Kinda of disappointed, because it seems like solid unit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful desk mat at a reasonable price. It's a good size, too, and the color is a beautiful deep brown with attractive stitching around the edges. Enough padding to make writing on paper docs much better vs on desk directly. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Biggest Fan

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to deal with tracking receipt , when paired with computer I can do some pretty amazing things . It scans barcode into excel and take it down to the next field as if I am hitting enter which masks things very nice . Loving it so far !
customer_reviews.author: Clint Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, and very staticky laser
customer_reviews.text: Laser is staticky and it takes a while for it to read barcodes.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hudgeons

customer_reviews.title: Can't handle check digit configuration
customer_reviews.text: We ignore check digits, but I couldn't find a way to disable it with this scanner. Support wasn't helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mills

customer_reviews.title: Nadamoo scanner speeds up inventory control
customer_reviews.text: I like the scanner very much. The scanner makes my inventory control much faster and more exact. The memory feature is an asset since I don't have electricity at my warehouse I bring it back to my office and upload everything on my desktop. I use the scanner to keep track of my inventory
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Schmit

customer_reviews.title: Saved a lot of time
customer_reviews.text: Scanner is functioning properly. I connect the scanner with another base following the direction, scan inventory and the scanner will distribute information to two computer almost at the same time. Saved a lot of time with this excellent scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Erick D Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Happy that I bought this scanner!
customer_reviews.text: Initially had a problem (it was plugged into the wrong USB port on my computer) and contacted them. They responded quickly and, although we figured it out on our own, I was very impressed and pleased with the customer support they provided. The stand is a little funky-it attaches with a wing nut, but it does what I need it to do and I have no complaints. Would definitely consider buying this again if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Auggies Doggies

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful desk addition!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk blotter and surface protector. It is classy looking and solid. It appears that it will hold up well. I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Read me
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works good other than the fact that every time you use it it resets which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Todd venosh

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Using as a spare to our $1100 scanner when that one goes down. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Maria H.

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This product is plug and play type, also comes with small hand book to change settings.
customer_reviews.author: Veerasenareddy Akkireddy

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your Time
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very cheesy, not well constructed. The performance is just as bad. My personal experience with this unit was not good. I sent it back and orderd a different brand of scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to setup and use. Works right away, and lots of options for different types of codes. Great, quick customer service from the company as well with any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vermes

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great support
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great support. Needed help figuring out why the scanner wasnt working with some barcode. Get help quickly from them. Also got another email to verify that everything is working properly without any issues. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent barcode scanner for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have fond this scanner to be easy to use and quite accurate. It's fast and rarely misses a barcode. We have purchased several of these because our initial one worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bersch

customer_reviews.title: We greatly enjoy the scanner
customer_reviews.text: We greatly enjoy the scanner. Wireless was our main requirement and this gets it done for a good price. We had one small thing to contact customer service over, needed to change a setting. They were very prompt with a solution that worked for us. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Magruder

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: For years we used a wired scanner. This is just amazing and the price is GREAT. if it lasts a year it is more than worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellegent Systems

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and i couldn't get it to work it was defective the company sent me a brand new one and its working great very happy
customer_reviews.author: manosh

customer_reviews.title: Wireless is good
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I need to trigger twice to scan the barcode
customer_reviews.author: Mario Caricola

customer_reviews.title: They go bad.
customer_reviews.text: These things are fantastic for about 4 months and then almost without exception they go bad. I ordered 5 of these about 6 months ago and so far 4 have just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Price E.

customer_reviews.title: The distance you are able to scan away from the cradle
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, you are able to do you job and not be tethered in a 2 foot area.
customer_reviews.author: Tela K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and setup. Scans all types of barcodes and easily programmed for what I needed as well. Customer service is responsive with any questions as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: First Class Service
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues with syncing my wireless scanner to computer and customer service was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great scanner! Works well and has a long range from the base. I defiantly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: They were easily configured and work reliably
customer_reviews.text: I have placed several of these units in our warehouse. They were easily configured and work reliably.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: This product shuts down the computer immediately every time it is plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Jan C.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One huge pro for this scanner is that its wireless, also it makes a "beep" noise whenever you scan something.
customer_reviews.author: Tofayel Hoque

customer_reviews.title: but so for is a great
customer_reviews.text: Only had a short time, but so for is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sims

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great customer service/tech support. Product has surpassed my expectations. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Doty

customer_reviews.title: can't read scan, no instructions or warranty  info
customer_reviews.text: To scan incoming freight bar codes for a particular vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Works for maybe a month
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 1 month, then would only work sometimes after that.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice for protecting your desk top. I am very happy with the price and product. I definitely would recommend them to anyone looking for a leather desk top protector.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works just fine for what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing wireless barcode scanners, easy and practical to use and a great price
customer_reviews.author: Ana Kayyali

customer_reviews.title: Love this Mat
customer_reviews.text: I love this mat--I have three; two for regular desk-top purposes, and one to use as a backing/base for doing jigsaw puzzles (it's perfect for that, too).
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Stosik

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made it seems but mine didn't work after going ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made it seems but mine didn't work after going through the provided troubleshooting decided to send it back. Ill try another brand hopefully with better results.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: can easily write on the surface
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for a desk that had grooves on the desktop, making it impossible to write on. cheaper solution that buying a new desk with a solid surface. the mat is very well made and arrived totally flat in its packaging. can easily write on the surface. if i have a large craft project that needs more space, i just move it to my dining room table and have no fears of damaging my wood table
customer_reviews.author: Pat D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for protecting my desk from scratches, pen/pencil marks, and water marks from cups.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a scanner that can read barcodes ...
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a scanner that can read barcodes from a computer monitor display then this one is not for you. I have a usb wired scanner that does this task with no problem, but this one doesn't cut the mustard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Got this to cover my wooden desktop to soften it up a bit and add a bit of color. The mat is thick enough to add some good padding, but not so thick that it gets annoying. It has a somewhat strong leather scent out of the package, but fades quickly. The size is good, and fits either my laptop and mouse, or an external keyboard and mouse well, with a bit of room to write on a notepad. The item I received had bent in shipping, but the company was fantastic about working with me to get a replacement that was flat and unblemished. Overall, a great purchase, and exactly what I needed to enhance my desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Klyon77

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I hate it . scam . It stopped working in a month.
customer_reviews.author: One and Only Logistics

customer_reviews.title: They do not last. I purchased 3 for our ...
customer_reviews.text: They do not last. I purchased 3 for our farm & ranch supply store in November. One did not work originally, which the company replaced. However, now all three have stopped working. I will not reorder. They have to last more than 3 1/2 months!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Jacob

customer_reviews.title: bad!
customer_reviews.text: This is really a bad shopping experience.There is no way to use a wireless.No worth the price.I will return!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

product_meta.title: NADAMOO Wireless Barcode Scanner with USB Cradle Charging Base 328Ft Long Transmission Handheld 1D Cordless Laser Barcode Reader Portable Bar Code Scanning for Retail Supermaket Warehouse
product_meta.description: Color:BlackNADAMOO Wireless Barcode Scanner with USB Cradle Receiver Charging Base 433MHz Handheld 1D Cordless Laser Barcode Reader Portable Bar Code Scanning for Retail Supermaket Warehouse
feature_bullets: USB plug-and-play, no driver installation needed.Just plug USB into USB port of your device and run a EXCEL/WORD file or other appliaction then scan,barcode is entered into the field your cursor is in.Utility cradle can be used as a receiver or a charging base.
Using Wireless Transmission Technology.Delivers up to 400 meter/0.25 mile in open area, up to 100 meter/ 328 feet indoor.No Data Cable Needed, freely transmit the barcode to your computer,PC etc.
Powerful matching function: supporting 3 kind of paring modes (one to one,one-to-many and many-to-one). One receiver can receive messages from 32 pieces of scanner at the same time.

Three upload mode:Instant upload mode / storage mode/Non-Losing mode.In storage mode,the scanner will automatically store the data in it’s own memory when the data can not upload to the computer (when the transfer distance is too far or there are other signal interruption). It guarantee the data will not be lose.Internal storage supports up to 10,000 barcodes in offline storage mode.You could upload the data to computer when you need it.
We offer one year Hassle free warranty, Pack include: Scanner*1, Cradle*1,USB cable*1,Manual*1

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
